{"step_by_step_thinking": "Nickel is added to wrought gold alloys as a strengthener and hardener. It increases the tensile strength, toughness, and elastic limit of the alloy. Nickel also improves the ductility of gold-copper alloys. Therefore, the correct answer is A. Strengthener and B. Hardener.", "answer_choice": "A. Strengthener and B. Hardener"}
